price: ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߌߟߋ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊ߬ߞߐ߬ߣߐ߲߬ߠߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߗߐ߫ ߸ ߛߊ߲ ߣߊ߬ߕߐ߫ ߛߌ߬ߛߌ߬ ߘߐ߬ߜߍ ߘߌ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲
arabic: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-ir'taqib yawma tatī al-samāu bidukhānin mubīnin
